title: Secondary terms in the first moment of $|{\rm Sel}_2(E)|$
abstract:
We prove the existence of secondary terms of order $X^{3/4}$, with power
saving error terms, in the counting functions of $|{\rm Sel}_2(E)|$, the
2-Selmer group of E, for elliptic curves E having height bounded by X. This is
the first improvement on the error term of $o(X^{5/6})$, proved by
Bhargava--Shankar, where the primary term of order $X^{5/6}$ for this counting
function was obtained.
